summary: A man who lost his family in the September 11 attack on New York City runs into his old college roommate. Rekindling the friendship is the one thing that appears able to help the man recover from his grief.
cast: Adam Sandler|Don Cheadle|Jada Pinkett Smith|Liv Tyler|Saffron Burrows|Donald Sutherland|Robert Klein|Melinda Dillon|Mike Binder|Jonathan Banks|Rae Allen|Paula Newsome|John de Lancie|Paul Butler|Camille LaChe Smith|Imani Hakim|Denise Dowse|Anthony Chisholm|B.J. Reynolds|Arick Salmea|Nick Vlassopoulos|Lisa Yaro
keywords: grief|mental breakdown|depression|post september 11 2001|attempted suicide by cop
title: En algún lugar de la memoria
